item.title: 【UPSCALED】Alan Walker, Hans Zimmer & Sasha Alex Sloan - Time vs Hero (TSD Remix⧸Mashup) [4K AI Upscale HEVC 10-bit | PCM]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic
Style: Electro House
Year: 2023
Video Source: Blu-ray & YouTube (Intro/Outro)
Audio Source: WebDL (link in YouTube description)

This is a Remix/Mashup by TSD.

In May 2020 British-Norwegian music producer and DJ Alan Walker remixed "Time", composed by Hans Zimmer. Originally written in 2010 for Christopher Nolan's critically acclaimed film Inception, "Time" is a highly dramatic, string-led piece. Alan Walker's rework holds onto a number of elements from the original composition while adding a handful of new digital elements. He's kicked up the tempo a bit and added a bassline, transforming "Time" into a house track that still retains cinematic moments.

"Hero" is a song by Alan Walker featuring American singer-songwriter Sasha Alex Sloan, released on May 4 2023. The song is a perfect blend of Walker's signature cinematic melodies and undulating basslines with Sloan's powerful vocals. The lyrics of the song celebrate the unsung heroes who brighten up our lives every day, making it an emotive anthem that listeners can connect with.

I like both tracks, but like this remix even more. TSD mashed the Time remix and Hero together like it was ment to be this way.

Release Info
The video track is upscaled to 4K with Topaz Video AI and converted to HEVC 10-bit.
The PCM track is lossless (link in YouTube description), synced with Adobe Audition.
The timed lyrics are synced and edited to match the music video.
Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.
